# **Interior Lighting Retrofit at Building M-59**
**Reference Number**: cb-444-10974179
**Solicitation Number**: 24-58266

**Overview**
This tender announcement invites contractors to submit proposals for the interior lighting retrofit at National Research Council Canada's Building M-59, located at 1200 Montreal Road, Ottawa, Ontario K1A 0R6.

**Key Details**

* **Tender Closing Date**: 2024-12-17 14:00:00
* **Expected Contract Start Date**: 2025-01-10
* **Expected Contract End Date**: 2025-03-31
* **Procurement Category**: Construction and Maintenance Services (CNST)
* **Procurement Method**: Competitive - Open Bidding
* **Selection Criteria**: Lowest Price
* **Trade Agreements**: Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* **Region of Opportunity**: Worldwide
* **Region of Delivery**: Ottawa, Canada

**Site Visits**
Mandatory site visits will be held on December 4, 2024, and December 5, 2024, at 10:00 am EST. Please meet Allan Smith at the specified location to gain further insight into the project.

**Work Under This Contract**
The successful contractor will be responsible for the interior lighting retrofit in Building M-59, meeting the requirements specified in the tender package.

**Tender Materials**
Tender documents, including an executive summary, tender package, and notice of proposed procurement, can be accessed at https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender\_notice/52564/

**Technical Contact**
For further information and clarification, please contact Stéphane Lajoie at stephane.lajoie@nrc-cnrc.gc.ca or (514) 210-7395.

**Closing Note**
This tender announcement does not exclude the possibility of amendments. It is the sole responsibility of the bidder to ensure that they are aware of any updates to the tender process. We look forward to receiving your proposals by the specified closing date.
